import React from 'react' import './Resume.css'; import SchoolIcon from '@mui/icons-material/School'; import { Grid , Icon, Paper, TextField, Typography} from "@material-ui/core"; import resumeData from '../../utils/resumeData'; import CustomTimeline , {CustomTimelineSeparator} from "../../components/Timeline/Timeline"; import WorkIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Work'; import { TimelineContent, TimelineDot, TimelineItem } from '@material-ui/lab'; const Resume = () => { return (
{/* About me */}
About me
 {resumeData.about} {/*Education and experiences */}
Resume
 {/* Experiences*/} }> {resumeData.experiences.map( (experience) => ( {experience.title } {experience.date } {experience. description} ) )} {/* Education */} }> {resumeData.educations.map( (education) => ( {education.title } {education.date } {education.description} ) )} {/*Services */}
Services
 {resumeData.services.map((service) =>(
{ServiceWorker.icon} {service.title} {service.description}
))} {/* Skills */} {resumeData.skills.map((skill) => ( {skill.title} {skill.description.map((element) => ( {element} ))} ))} {/* Contact */} {/* Contact Form */}
Contact Form
 {/* Contact infomation*/}
); }; export default Resume;
